item.title: LF Mentorship Session
item.description: Notes from LF Live Mentorship Session: Best Practices to Getting Your Patches Accepted Important notes and links: Start watching mailing lists of your interest, https://lore.kernel.org/lists.html Take LFD103 which is a free LF training that offers tips on how to start contributing. Check this site to see if you can fix any bugs https://syzkaller.appspot.com/upstream https://training.linuxfoundation.org/training/a-beginners-guide-to-linux-kernel-development-lfd103/ https://kernelnewbies.org/ is a good start also check the #kernenewbies channel on OFTC
